title: Getting Started with FastAPI
content: FastAPI is a modern, fast (high-performance), web framework for building APIs with Python 3.8+ based on standard Python type hints.
author: Alice

title: Python Type Hints
content: Python type hints are a way to specify the type of a variable, function parameter, or return value.
author: Bob

title: Asynchronous Programming
content: Asyncio is a library to write concurrent code using the async/await syntax.
author: Charlie

title: Dependency Injection in FastAPI
content: FastAPI has a very powerful Dependency Injection system, which is very easy to use.
author: Alice
